v1.19.0.description: fixes issue with flyout focus incorrectly being reset when the browser viewport size changes
fixes behavior so flyout gets focus when it's shown and focus reverts back to the opening button when it's hidden

v1.18.0.description: fixes behavior so flyout hides when the escape key is pressed

v1.17.0.description: fixes flyout loading issue because of slow binding of JavaScript

v1.15.0.description: overhauls flyout placement algorithm to better handle flyouts nested inside positioned elements
